description:
Powder Town Pants ride through hero runs and survival conditions. A tough 2-layer polyester shell stands up to abrasion from crusty snow or branches, and the DWR treatment keeps the droplets beading and prevents saturation. Inside, a soft taffeta lining manages moisture and glides smoothly over underlayers. External thigh vents let you regulate your climate. Articulated knees and a gusseted crotch provide unlimited mobility for big air shows.

  • Durable 2-layer polyester H2No® breathable membrane with a DWR finish to keep you dry
  • Insulated with Thermogreen® recycled polyester, tailored thicknesses promote easy movement
  • Waist has a brushed lining to wick moisture, and adjustable elastic tabs to customize the fit. 2-snap closure and zip fly
  • Loops on rear yoke attach pant to powder skirt on any Patagonia® Snow jacket to keep snow out
  • Slim, watertight coated zippers for reduced bulk and weight
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees improve mobility and reduce bulk
  • External thigh vents quickly release heat
  • Gaiters keep the snow out, while tough scuff guards protect the inside of the leg and bottom hem
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate Recco reflectors under snow. Useful for resort skiing, Recco technology is not a substitute for avalanche skills training, beacons, essential gear, or smart decision-making in the backcountry
name: Patagonia Insulated Powder Town Pants - Women's
